definition: of certain seeds having a tuft or tufts of hair, as seen on cotton, a clay or metal griddle used for cooking in Central America
details:
adjective
- of certain seeds having a tuft or tufts of hair, as seen on cotton
= example: of certain seeds having a tuft or tufts of hair, as seen on cotton
= synonyms: comate
noun
- a clay or metal griddle used for cooking in Central America
= example: a clay or metal griddle used for cooking in Central America
